metadata.title: CVE-2015-2937 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: MediaWiki before 1.19.24, 1.2x before 1.23.9, and 1.24.x before 1.24.2,when using HHVM or Zend PHP, allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice ("quadratic blowup" and memory consumption) via an XML filecontaining an entity declaration with long replacement text and manyreferences to this entity, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-2942.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
